subject: SalEats Interview
body:
Hey,

The SalEats team reviewed your resume, and we would love to schedule an interview with you this week. Can you call me if you still do?

Thanks,
William Chen

subject: Rescheduled Interview
body:
Hello,
Your interview has requested to reschedule the interview. When are your next best available dates?
Victor Adamchik

subject: Your Application Has Been Submitted
body: Thank you for submitting an application. We will get back to you within two to four weeks.

subject: [Please Read] Important Information
body: Congratulations on your internship! We need some important information from you in order to continue with your internship!

subject: New Developer Position Available
body:
Hello,
There's a new position available at our company if you would like to apply.

subject: Thank You For Your Application!
body: We have received your application and will respond in two weeks!
